name: Aadhikesava Perumal Temple
description: The temple has an area of 3 acres 27 cents. The temple is situated on a large mound 5 m above the ground level. The grandeur of the temple and the river flowing around the temple on three sides are its special features.

festivals/nChitrai - Vishu, Poornami, Sri Rama Navami, Bharani, Vaikasi â€“ Visakham, Aadi - Makara Sankranti, temple mass, Avani - Krishna Jayanti, Thiruvananthapuram, Karthikai - Scorpio lamp, Margazhi - Heaven Gate Ekadasi, The festival takes place for ten days in the months of Aipasi and Panguni. Panguni month celebration is great.
location: Temple Road Kalkulam, Kulasegaram Taluk, Thiruvattaru, TamilNadu 629171
